name: Memoria (itch) (arabellaturner)
description:
This game was made during the IOC Bootcamp at UWE. It was built over 8 weeks from idea to game. 

This game takes a 'tetris-like' approach to puzzle-solving. You connect correct pieces together to create blocks, and further combine blocks to build up the puzzle. 

I would like to add other levels to this game in the near future, so I can build a narrative element into the game. The most challenging element of the process was working out the code so that the game has a 'tetris' element, now this has been done I can use this code to build more intricate and non-rectangle/square objects.

INTENDING TO UPLOAD NEW VERSION OF GAME 31st MARCH.
